description: A quick, practical guide to Nilo-Saharan: Languages of the Great Rift.

hook.text: Stretching from the Sahara to Tanzania, Nilo-Saharan languages are among the most diverse and least studied.

buildup.text: The family includes Maasai, Luo, Dinka, Kanuri, and about 200 other languages.

discovery.text: Nilo-Saharan speakers include pastoralists, farmers, and hunter-gatherers across a dozen countries.
